";}}i:47;a:10:{s:2:"id";s:10:"5521266199";s:6:"secret";s:10:"e92e937ff1";s:6:"server";s:4:"5215";s:4:"farm";d:6;s:5:"title";s:17:"PBR Cans (Detail)";s:9:"isprimary";s:1:"0";s:8:"ispublic";i:1;s:8:"isfriend";i:0;s:8:"isfamily";i:0;s:11:"description";a:1:{s:8:"_content";s:74:"2010, Stoneware, Cone 05, Spray Paint, Vinyl Decals, 5 1/2 x 10 Inches ea.";}}i:48;a:10:{s:2:"id";s:10:"5521264759";s:6:"secret";s:10:"1bd2cbfb87";s:6:"server";s:4:"5296";s:4:"farm";d:6;s:5:"title";s:8:"PBR Cans";s:9:"isprimary";s:1:"0";s:8:"ispublic";i:1;s:8:"isfriend";i:0;s:8:"isfamily";i:0;s:11:"description";a:1:{s:8:"_content";s:74:"2010, Stoneware, Cone 05, Spray Paint, Vinyl Decals, 5 1/2 x 10 Inches ea.";}}i:49;a:10:{s:2:"id";s:10:"5521853380";s:6:"secret";s:10:"16a179e479";s:6:"server";s:4:"5216";s:4:"farm";d:6;s:5:"title";s:8:"PBR Cans";s:9:"isprimary";s:1:"0";s:8:"ispublic";i:1;s:8:"isfriend";i:0;s:8:"isfamily";i:0;s:11:"description";a:1:{s:8:"_content";s:972:"I've been working with clay for many years, and once had been assigned to make a six pack of bottles in a college ceramics course.  Sitting around one night with my housemates drinking tall boys of PBR in DC, the idea reemerged.  The next day I went to the studio and got to work.  I threw each can on the potters wheel and fired them to cone 05.  Not sure as to how to apply the artwork to each can, I opted for metallic spray paint and vinyl decals.  My local copy shop refused to create the logos, so I talked with PBR and got  a letter to give to the shop allowing me permission to print the decals.  Each decal was a pain in the &quot;expletive&quot; to adhere evenly to the can taking about 20 minutes, soapy water, and a hair dryer to place.  In total this project when on for about three months, but the end result was worth the efforts.  Each can is 5.5 inches in diameter and 10 inches in height.  I hope people can enjoy them as much as I do... Cheers,  Paul   ";}}i:50;a:10:{s:2:"id";s:10:"6034364418";s:6:"secret";s:10:"ca82d51f6a";s:6:"server";s:4:"6130";s:4:"farm";d:7;s:5:"title";s:9:"Wide
